title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements. Conduct stakeholder interviews and analyze existing construction documents to understand the problem space and identify key information to be extracted.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture for AIConstructionDocumentAnalyzer, focusing on a robust OCR and NLP approach. The design will include an AI model, document processing pipeline, user interface components, data storage, deployment strategy, ensuring scalability, performance, security, maintainability, accessibility, and data privacy. High-level components, their interactions, and data flow will be defined for proper separation of concerns and modular design. Address challenges such as handling large document volumes, parallel processing, and efficient data retrieval. Implement advanced features like real-time analysis, version control, and user customization. Utilize TensorFlow for AI model, Django or Flask for backend, React for frontend. Consider technologies like Tesseract (OCR), NLTK/Spacy (NLP), PostgreSQL (data storage), AWS Lambda (deployment). Include unit testing as part of the development process to ensure code quality. Additionally, consider edge cases such as handling scanned or low-quality documents and incorporating a user-friendly error handling mechanism. Update the 'rfc_state' field once this RFC is ready for implementation.

title: Data Preparation and Annotation
description: Collect and preprocess a diverse set of construction documents for training and testing the AI model. Annotate key information in the documents for supervised learning.

title: AI Model Development
description: Develop and train the AI model for information extraction from construction documents, using techniques like natural language processing, computer vision, and deep learning.

title: User Interface Design and Development
description: Design and develop the user interface for the AI tool, including document upload, information extraction, and result visualization components.

title: Integration and Testing
description: Integrate the AI model, document processing pipeline, and user interface components. Conduct thorough testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the AI tool complies with relevant security and privacy regulations, such as GDPR and data protection laws. Implement secure data handling and access control mechanisms.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the infrastructure and deployment pipeline for the AI tool, including containerization, scaling, monitoring, and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD).

title: Documentation and User Training
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the AI tool, including user guides, technical documentation, and training materials. Conduct user training sessions for stakeholders and end-users.
